content:
Yes, there are several restaurants and street vendors that offer authentic Guntur cuisine. Here are some of the places I would recommend:

1. Subbayya Gari Hotel: It is a legendary restaurant in Guntur that has been serving delicious Andhra-style food for over 70 years. Their Gongura Mutton and Natukodi Pulao are must-tries.

2. Mayuri Restaurant: This is a popular restaurant chain in Andhra Pradesh that offers a wide range of Andhra-style food. Their Gongura Chicken, Pesarattu Dosa, and Ulava Charu are highly recommended.

3. Naidu Gari Kunda Biryani: It is a street food vendor in Guntur that is famous for their delicious biryani. Their Kunda Biryani and Nellore Fish Curry are must-tries.

4. JB's Mandhi: It is a restaurant in the heart of Guntur that is well known for its Arabic-style Mandhi rice dishes. Their Mandhi with chicken or mutton is highly recommended.

5. Sreerasthu: It is a popular restaurant in Guntur that specializes in Andhra-style vegetarian food. Their Andhra Meals, Dal Makhani, and Biryani are highly recommended.

These are just a few examples of the many wonderful places to try authentic Guntur cuisine. There are plenty of street vendors and smaller restaurants that offer equally delicious food as well.
